title: 'Hand grenade' thrown at U.S. embassy in Montenegro
text:
'Hand grenade' thrown at U.S. embassy in Montenegro 7:28am GMT - 00:37 
An unknown man thew an explosive device, thought to be a hand grenade, at the U.S. embassy in Montenegro on Thursday night, before reportedly blowing himself up.   
An unknown man thew an explosive device, thought to be a hand grenade, at the U.S. embassy in Montenegro on Thursday night, before reportedly blowing himself up.  //reut.rs/2sMslRZ
